alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:12AM CDT until July 26 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JUNEAU AND SOUTHERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 511 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Mauston, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mauston, Adams, Lemonweir, Lyndon Station, Castle Rock, County Roads B And P. This includes Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 68 and 86. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If on or near Castle Rock Lake or the Wisconsin River, move to shore immediately. Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
